abstract.text: An intent for requesting money from another user’s account.
Siri phrases that trigger the requesting of a payment
An intent for requesting money from another user’s account.
The handler interface for delivering a request for payment from another user of your app.
Your app’s response to a request payment intent.
Initializes the request payment intent object with the specified recipient and payment information.
The recipient of the payment request.
A note associated with the request.

inlineContent.text: object when the current user requests a payment from another user. A request payment intent object includes the payment amount and the person receiving the request. This intent represents only a request for payment and shouldn’t make initiate any payments.
To handle this intent, the handler object in your Intents extension must adopt the
protocol. Your handler should confirm the request and create an
object with the results of making the request.
lists additional attributes of this intent object.
Siri Intents, Siri Suggestions, Shortcuts app

When performing a search, Siri automatically asks the user to unlock a currently locked device. You don’t need to explicitly ask to unlock the device. In addition, Siri always prompts the user to confirm the request before asking your Intents extension to handle it.
Users can ask Siri to request a payment in a variety of ways.
provides a few sample phrases in different languages. You can use these phrases during testing to trigger your intents. This list isn’t exhaustive and Siri may recognize many other phrases.
Ask Nancy to pay me $25 on
siri可以从小白那边收50元吗
Demande à Thomas 40€ pour le repas sur
Demande à John qu'il me transfère 45 € utilisant
Chiedi 30 € ad Alessandro per il pranzo usando
Chiedi a Federico di pagarmi 250 € su
でランチ代3,000円を田中に請求して
で田中にリクエストして
Minta wang untuk makan siang daripada Azim dengan menggunakan
Verzoek € 30 van Alexander voor de lunch via
Vraag Nele om me € 25 te betalen op
Запросила для меня 2000 рублей от Александра с помощью
Begär du att få låna 100 kr från Gunilla med hjälp av
เรียกเก็บเงิน 100 บาทจากสมพงษ์โดยใช้
เก็บเงินจากสมพงษ์ 10 บาทด้วย
